about.summary: pytest-localserver is a plugin for the pytest testing framework which enables you to test server connections locally.

name: pytest-localserver
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "pytest-localserver" %}
{% set version = "0.3.6" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "fa4e29a5eaf912055955c924652061e6eac0c13747cd6af7b119ed989fbeb03c" %}
{% set ext = "tar.gz" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ ext }}
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ ext }}
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - werkzeug >=0.10
  run:
    - python
    - pytest
    - werkzeug >=0.10

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
  imports:
    - pytest_localserver
  commands:
    - py.test --help

about:
  home: https://bitbucket.org/pytest-dev/pytest-localserver
  license: MIT
  summary: pytest-localserver is a plugin for the pytest testing framework which enables you to test server connections locally.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nicoddemus
